Posts.Content: Feb 8, 2010 11:07PM - edited Feb 8, 2010 11:13PM by amyob Hi Cookie,  Is your IDC .2 cm (2 mm)?  Or is it actually .2 mm?  That would be less than 1 mm.  If so, I would check 2 posts:  1- Microinvasive DCIS with Her2+, ER-, and PR- and 2-DCIS with less than 1 mm microinvasion.  There is a growing number of us with this rare diagnosis and lots of useful info there.
Posts.Title: very small tumors cookie2009 amyob
